alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:41PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood, Portage and southeastern Marathon Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1041 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Mosinee to 13 miles east of Marshfield to 7 miles northwest of Wisconsin Rapids to near Babcock to 12 miles northwest of Necedah. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wisconsin Rapids around 1050 PM CDT. Mosinee around 1055 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lake Wazeecha, Stevens Point, Whiting and Bevent. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
